dmca.title: B-2 Bomber Article Posting in Google Subject of Takedown Request
dmca.body:
[private]

[private]	E-Mail: [private]@aol.com TeleFax: [private]
Niskayuna, NY 12309
		November 11, 2003
Google, Inc.
Attn: User Support, DMCA complaints
[private]
Mountain View, CA 94043

The google urls and their corresponding illicitly posted copyrighted texts are, listed below. I don't know what search words pulled up these pages since I was notified about them by a concerned citizen who had found them. I tried and found that the following search phrases pulled up this posting: "antigravity squadron" or "B-2 bomber" plus "antigravity". Or even my name "[private]" and "B-2" pulled up one of them. The first, second, and third postings listed below were placed by the same individual who apparently knew that they were published in a copyrighted book (as indicated by the, preamble to his posting),

One month after the first set of violations took place (a through c) the following Copyright warning was posted to Google, but the posted material was unfortunately not removed by Google staff and continuing violations ensued (see incidents d and e. below). Also see the warning posted at: http://groups.google.com/groups?q=b2+antigravivity&hl=en&lr= &ie=UTF8 &selm=4k8ih2%244h9%40nuntius.u-net.net &rnum=3.

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described below on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner (myself), its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury consistent with United States Code Title 17, Section 512, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. 

The incident is as follows: 

a) First infringement (Part I of copyrighted article): 

http://groups.google.com/groups?selm=4hmvrj%24ra9%40nuntius.u-net.net

From: [private]@ccom.u-net.com
Subject: B2: 1 of 3
Date: 1996/03/07
Message-ID: <4hmvrj$ra9@nuntius.u-net.net> 
organization: U-NET limited 
newsgroups: rec.aviation.military


[essay redacted]

b) Second infringement (Part II of copyrighted article):

From: [private]@ccom.u-net.com
Subject: B2: 2 of 3
Date: 1996/03/07
Message-ID: <4hmvs0$ra9@nuntius.u-net.net> 
organization: U-NET limited 
newsgroups: rec.aviation.military

[essay redacted]

c) Third infringement (Part III of copyrighted article)

http://groups.google.com/groups?selm =4hmvsh%24ra9%40nuntius.u-net.net

From: [private]@ccom.u-net.com
Subject: B2: 3 of 3
Date: 1996/03/07
Message-ID: <4hmvsh$ra9@nuntius.u-net.net> 
organization: U-NET limited 
newsgroups: rec.aviation.military

[essay redacted]

d) Fourth infringement (entire copyrighted article):

http://groups.google.com/groups?selm=4hmvsh%24ra9%40nuntius.u-net.net

From: [private]@ccom.u-net.com
Subject: B2: 3 of 3
Date: 1996/03/07
Message-ID: <152302Z26061996> 
organization: anonymous forwarding service
reply-to: [private]@anon.penet.fi
newsgroups: rec.aviation.military

[essay redacted]

Sincerely yours,

[private]
